channel.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Community Call Recordings on Microsoft 365 Community Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft 365 Developer Community Call Recordings on Microsoft 365 Community Blog

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Community Call recording -- 20th of January, 2021
item.description: Call summary One location the Microsoft 365 tenant – script samples gallery (134 scenarios and 182 scripts) including recently added Teams PowerShell support!

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Community Call recording -- 6th of January, 2021
item.description: Call summary Welcome to the New Year. It’s a great time to visit the Microsoft 365 tenant – script samples gallery (129 scenarios and 173 scripts) including recently added Teams PowerShell support!

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Community Call recording -- 23rd of December, 2021
item.description: Call summary It’s the perfect time to visit the Microsoft 365 tenant – script samples gallery (123 scenarios and 168 scripts) today.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Community Call recording -- 9th of December, 2021
item.description: Call summary Why not visit the Microsoft 365 tenant – script samples gallery (118 scenarios and 161 scripts) today.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Community Call recording -- 25th of November, 2021
item.description: Call summary Have you visited the Microsoft 365 tenant – script samples gallery (116 scenarios and 160 scripts, using CLI for Microsoft 365, PnP PowerShell, SPO Management Shell tooling and more…)?

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Community Call recording -- 11th of November, 2021
item.description: Call summary Visit the Microsoft 365 tenant – script samples gallery (114 scenarios and 156 scripts, using CLI for Microsoft 365, PnP PowerShell, SPO Management Shell tooling and more…)?

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Community Call recording -- 28th of October, 2021
item.description: Call summary SharePoint Framework v1.13 is now generally available! Have you visited the Microsoft 365 tenant – script samples gallery (106 scenarios and 142 scripts, using CLI for Microsoft 365, PnP PowerShell, SPO Management Shell tooling and more…)?

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Community Call recording -- 30th of September, 2021
item.description: Call summary Have a look at Microsoft 365 tenant – script samples gallery (90 scenarios and 118 scripts, using CLI for Microsoft 365, PnP PowerShell, SPO Management Shell tooling and more…).

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Community Call recording -- 16th of September, 2021
item.description: Call summary Have a look at Microsoft 365 tenant – script samples gallery (84 scenarios and 111 scripts)*.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Developer Community Call recording -- 2nd of September, 2021
item.description: Call summary Welcome back from summer holiday! Have a look at Microsoft 365 tenant – script samples gallery - s*cripts for PowerShell and CLIs.
